remarks: Closure of the group operation of the loop space.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
om1bas.o $e |- O = ( J Om1 Y ) $.
om1bas.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
om1bas.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
om1bas.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` O ) ) $.
om1addcl.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. B ) $.
om1addcl.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. B ) $.
om1addcl $p |- ( ph -> ( H ( *p ` J ) K ) e. B ) $.
